An Energy potion can be purchased from the Apothecary in Varrock for 1 chocolate dust and 2 limpwurt roots. Members can also make them using the Herblore skill by mixing Harralander in a vial of water and then adding chocolate dust. This requires level 26 Herblore, and gives 67.5 Herblore experience. Each dose of this potion restores 10% of the player's run energy.

If the player adds caviar to a 2-dose potion, it will become a 2-dose energy mix, which heals 3 hitpoints in addition to restoring 10% run energy.

A 4-dose potion is obtained from Dr Jekyll after giving him a Ranarr weed.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
9 March 2017
(update)

The item was made available to free-to-play players.

15 April 2016
(update)

Half full potions could now be turned into bank placeholders.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • As potions are a part of the members-only Herblore skill, they had been members-only items since their creation. They were made accessible to free players on 9 March 2017.

An '''Energy potion''' can be purchased from the [[Apothecary]] in Varrock for 1 [[chocolate dust]] and 2 [[limpwurt roots]]. [[Members]] can also make them using the [[Herblore]] skill by mixing [[Harralander]] in a [[vial of water]] and then adding [[chocolate dust]]. This requires level 26 Herblore, and gives 67.5 Herblore experience. Each dose of this potion restores 10% of the player's run [[energy]].

If the player adds [[caviar]] to a 2-dose potion, it will become a 2-dose [[energy mix]], which heals 3 [[hitpoints]] in addition to restoring 10% run energy.

A 4-dose potion is obtained from [[Dr Jekyll]] after giving him a [[Ranarr weed]].

|skill1lvl = 26
|skill1boostable =Yes 
|skill1exp = 67.5
|members = Yes
|ticks = 2
|mat1 = Harralander potion (unf)
|mat2 = Chocolate dust
|output1 = Energy potion(3)
}}
===Apothecary===
{{Recipe

|ticks = 0
|facilities = Apothecary
|mat1 = Limpwurt root
|mat1quantity = 2
|mat2 = Chocolate dust
|output1 = Energy potion(4)
}}
